snippet: A judge certified a class action against the Minneapolis-based retailer Target that had been brought by several banks over a data breach in 2013.
abstract: Paul Magnuson, United States District Court judge in St Paul, affirms class action lawsuit against Target for 2013 credit card data breach that compromised at least 40 million cards.
lead_paragraph: A judge certified a class action against the Minneapolis-based retailer Target that had been brought by several banks over a data breach in 2013.

headline.print_headline: Ruling Allows Banks to Sue Target Over 2013 Data Breach
headline.main: Ruling Allows Banks to Sue Target Over 2013 Data Breach
